SEARCH
Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.handling

Interface PlayPayloadHandlingContext

All Superinterfaces:
PayloadConnection, PayloadHandlingContext, PayloadSender
public interface PlayPayloadHandlingContext extends PayloadHandlingContext
Context used for applying a payload during the 'play' phase.

This is an abstraction over the various loader-specific contexts given when receiving a packet.

    • mustGetPlayer

      @NotNull default @NotNull net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player mustGetPlayer() throws PayloadHandlingException
      Gets the player that received this payload or throws an exception if no player is present.
      Returns:
      the receiver player.
      Throws:
      PayloadHandlingException - if this payload was received without a player to receive it.

    • mustGetWorld

      @NotNull default @NotNull net.minecraft.world.level.Level mustGetWorld() throws PayloadHandlingException
      Gets the world in which this payload was received or throws an exception if no world is available.
      Returns:
      the world where this payload was received.
      Throws:
      PayloadHandlingException - if this payload was received without a world where it was received.
